page.title: 15Childrens Games 1
page.content: {Kangaroos. { } This is an easy game for 5 year olds. The rules are very basic. You have a group of people and pick out one to be a chaser. The chaser goes after the others. Most important everyone has to jump. Abigail Ellis {Horses} For playing horses you need a skipping rope and 2 or more children. One child holds the ends of the rope whilst one or two of the others stand in the loop. They are the horses. They trot round the playground and pretend to eat their dinner. This is a good game for 7 year olds. Samantha Shewbridge.
